member.name: DATAOBJ_GET_ITEM_FLAGS
member.summary: Values used by the function to specify options concerning the processing of the source object.

member.name: DATAOBJ_GET_ITEM_FLAGS.DOGIF_TRAVERSE_LINK
member.summary: 0x0001. If the source object is a link, base the on the link's target rather than the link file itself.

member.name: DATAOBJ_GET_ITEM_FLAGS.DOGIF_NO_HDROP
member.summary: 0x0002. If the source data object does not contain data in the CFSTR_SHELLIDLIST format, which identifies the object through an IDList, do not revert to the CF_HDROP format, which uses a file path, as an alternative in the transfer.

member.name: DATAOBJ_GET_ITEM_FLAGS.DOGIF_NO_URL
member.summary: 0x0004. If the source data object does not contain data in the CFSTR_SHELLIDLIST format, which identifies the object through an IDList, do not revert to the CFSTR_INETURL clipboard format, which uses a URL, as an alternative in the transfer.

member.name: DATAOBJ_GET_ITEM_FLAGS.DOGIF_ONLY_IF_ONE
member.summary: 0x0008. If the source object is an array of items, use it only if the array contains just one item.
